amendment.description: Amendment emphasizes the priority of funding grants which would improve access, coordination, and the provision of health care to the uninsured, underinsured, and medically underserved areas in both rural and urban settings.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part C of House Report 109-603 to focus a priority of the integrated health system grant program on the improved coordination of care for the uninsured, underinsured, and medically underserved residing in geographically isolated areas or underserved urban areas.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cuellar amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Cuellar.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cuellar amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
